headline: How The CenterPoint Energy (CNP) Investment Story Is Shifting With New Growth And Valuation Signals
summary: CenterPoint Energy’s updated fair value price target of $43.44, up from $42.50, reflects a modest shift in how analysts are framing the stock’s potential. The change sits alongside research that highlights both optimism around growth projects, regulatory clarity and tax benefits, and caution tied to the stock’s current premium and broader utility sector sentiment. As you read on, you will see how these moving pieces shape the evolving analyst narrative and what that might mean for tracking...
